activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10508
activity.text:
Hi @nihal467 , @vigneshhari and @amit-kr-debug 

I came across the CARE HR Module project and found it really interesting. I’d love to contribute, especially in areas like backend development (Django), frontend (ReactJS), or dashboard design. As I am learning and improving my skills in these technologies, this project seems like a great opportunity to gain hands-on experience while helping the team.

Could you please guide me on how I can get started? I’m open to any beginner-friendly tasks and eager to learn from your feedback. Looking forward to your response!
